Google says that Page will oversee "day-to-day" operations, while Eric Schmidt will focus on the company's external relationships including deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Sergey Brin , the other Google co-founder, will no longer be president of technology; he will work on "strategic projects."
